sentences.sentence: We often tell the newest members of the farm to meet us at the Hackberry Tree.
sentences.translation: 我们总是告诉农场的新成员在那那棵朴树下面见面。

sentences.sentence: " Do not know if you still remember the hackberry campus folk "platyphylla", perhaps inspired to do?
sentences.translation: 不知道大家还记得朴树的校园民谣《白桦林》，或许就是从中获得灵感呢？
